website_summaries.verdict: A thick and fluffy comforter set that will make it even harder to get out of bed in the morning.
pros: Comforter is thick and fluffy without being too heavy
Comes in a variety of solid colors from bold to neutral
Set also includes one matching pillow sham
cons: Comforter wrinkles easily, so not ideal for those who like a crisp look

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is very soft and seems to be better quality than I expected for that price. We can’t keep the cat off of it
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering a bed set online, but they feel so great! They have been through a few washes and hasn't faded or got ruined. The cotton also hasn't been ruined by the dryer. Very cozy. They stay fresh all night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of lint after the first wash. Thought maybe I had something in the wash with it that caused it (although in hindsight, I realize I washed it alone). It’s going on the trash. It’s only gotten worse. The stuffing seems to be coming out in the seams and it even has some tears. Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: first time I buy a bad product in Amazon
customer_reviews.text: It came apart right away, the insides filling material started to come out. Regret buying, first time I buy a bad product in Amazon, I order every month for.many years
customer_reviews.author: kalijega

customer_reviews.title: So soft & comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my sons room. One red & the other dark blue/navy. They’re very soft & washed up nicely. Much better than expected. My boys love them. I was looking for the perfect red for my son! The red is brighter than pictured which is what I was hoping for. He’s very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear x4

customer_reviews.title: It's decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nothing junk, nothing special. People need to realize you aren't going to get a $100 comforter for $40. The pillow cases are decent, the ones I already have are softer though. Wish it was a bit bigger, but a size like queen/full will always be a compromise (slightly small queen/slightly large large full). The plastic tote bag is absolutely useless though, the only way this fits in the bag is if it is the whole thing is vacuum sealed (like it is shipped). The bag will be useful to pack some sheet sets, but absolutely useless for this.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and held up nicely
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's dorm room. She used it all year and it held up nicely and was cozy for her. Nice thing is, it will serve as a nice blanket now that she doesn't need a twin long for anything anymore. Great price for the product. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: srnoot

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Beware buying this comforter. Pros: warm and soft and heavy/thick. Con: like so many others here, the seemingly small, white fill threads come out through the outer cover. If you pull one, it becomes a full tuft of stuffing. It’s better to cut, but it will continue to come through. Even after washing in high temp water and a commercial dryer, the outer fabric just won’t tighten to keep the stuffing in! Because I waited so long, I can only gift them (I bought two) to a charity. I should have listened to all who reported the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: YorkiesRock

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Soft Bedding
customer_reviews.text: I love the bedding. It is very soft and perfect for my son’s room. It is very hard to find a solid color bedspread and one right for a teenage boy. He loves it! My only reason for not giving it 5 stars is the time it took to receive. I ordered on June 30th and just got it today July 11th. Taking out weekends and holidays it took 7 business days to get here even though it was a Prime and said it would be here in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: What is goose down alternative?
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product having purchased goose down alternative bedspreads in the past. Upon reading the label it indicates that the filling is polyester. ???? Not what I was expecting as other's I have purchased are lighter weight and not as thick and still warm during the winter months. Because I've already washed it before use, base on the instructions, I doubt I will be sending this back. Feel I was mislead by the meaning of "goose down alternative", but will keep it till it falls apart. FYI the block stitching did not catch the corners as after it was washed the corners fluffed up and needed some work to flatten out. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: K.S. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Batting coming out
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this comforter I was in love with it. The color, the feel, the weight were all perfect. Unfortunately, after a few months some white pilling started to appear. I thought it might be from a fluffier blanket I was using on top of it for the winter. However, when I went to pick the pills off, I realized it was the batting coming out right through the material. So now I can't pick these pills off or I'll have an empty comforter.
customer_reviews.author: TwoDrummers

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: Graveyard worker here. Those who work graveyards/nightshifts know how difficult it is to get good sleep during the day. This comforter is just right for me. Not too heavy (if you want weight blankets, this is not the one for you), and not too light either. During the warmer times of the year, it has a goose down feel to it, where it stays cool. During the winter months, it traps the heat without over trapping the heat. Please note this is for Bay area, CA winters so if you live in sub zero areas, this might not be right for you. I should have bought this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: walrus1050

customer_reviews.title: Off-gassing is intense!!
customer_reviews.text: The off-gassing from the inflated plastic bed smells bad and is irritating to my nasal passage even 5 full days in a well ventilated room, with the bed fully inflated. It's really annoying. The smell is likely very unhealthy Volatile organic compounds (VOCs) off-gassing. Although I'm not sure other air mattresses are made of better materials or packaged better. I'll say that I hate being in the room with the bed 5 days after it has been opened up, and it is negatively affecting my visit at a relatives house. Other than that, it's actually a VERY comfortable bed and easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: M. PATEL

customer_reviews.title: Has been through the wash several times and is holding up great - and still so soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for his college dorm and was pleasantly surprised. It is soooo soft but the real test was washing it - and wash it we did! Has been through the wash several times and is holding up great - and still so soft. I will be buying another for myself.
customer_reviews.author: dawntt

customer_reviews.title: Yeah it’s cheap but, it’s fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to bring on camping adventures and it wound up being the coziest blanket in the house. Thought if it gets beat up, no big deal... didn’t pay a lot for it. So, until it goes on an adventure, it has been put to the test. It has been washed several times, well used, abused, thrown around, jumped on by the dog, and yet always retains it shape, softness, and never turns lumpy. It is great in the Summer and even better for the winter; Very lightweight and yet keeps you warm in the cooler months. Who knew that such an inexpensive blanket could be so great? Buying another for the Master Bedroom and yet another as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: HolyChikin

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter
customer_reviews.text: Finally a cozy, soft, plush comforter at a reasonable price! We bought the oversized king and it fits beautifully on our king bed. All the other king size comforters were not long enough width-wise. My husband and I were constantly playing tug-of-war with blankets, but not this blanket. Highly recommend the oversized king for anyone with a king mattress. Seams and threading seem to be fine and the filling is evenly distributed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great color, very soft
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sky blue comforter for my son's bed and this is perfect. It's not super thick, but not super thin either. So far, it feels pretty warm. Washed it immediately with no problems- we're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: tasparks2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blanket
customer_reviews.text: OKAY so I got this blanket in oversized king. LET ME TELL YOU. This blanket is big enough for my fiance and I (two horrible blanket hoggers) and our baby in between. And theres still blanket left. This blanket is AMAZING. Just warm enough. Nice and soft. We got two thinking wed share but theyre too big. Having both in bed Is too much. I love this blanket. thank you for getting me to sleep in the same blanket as him again. I really missed it
customer_reviews.author: Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for comfortable...this is not for you.
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is thin. If you want something thick and comfortable this is not the one for you. This would be for someone that is looking for something between comfort and not too hot. So, you can get something between the middle of that. I still decide to keep it as this is for my 3 years old girl and I would rather not let her get stuck under the blanket when she is roll around during sleep time. But, if I'm going to buy it for myself...the answer is NO.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice affordable comforter for my son's bed and based on the other reviews I chose this one and I'm so happy I did! It comes vacuum sealed so I got nervous it was a thin blanket and then boom! Once you open the package it expands and is the perfect thickness. It is so soft and comfy too!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: The fabric seems nice enough for how inexpensive it is
customer_reviews.text: Some threads came loose after a couple days. The fabric seems nice enough for how inexpensive it is, but that means nothing if it can't hold itself together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for you buck!
customer_reviews.text: Overall: High 4/5 Not the softest. Feels like a soft cotton shirt at best but it is very breathable, light weight and very warm! I gave it a 4 star because if you wash this comforter, it’ll start getting ashy! It already started getting ashy after 2 days! Dust and misc. particles get stuck easy and you’ll need to lint-roll it to keep it a deep black.
customer_reviews.author: J Luna

customer_reviews.title: Warm, soft and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: For the price ($30 and free shipping) this is a warm, soft, comfortable blanket. It is not stiff or crinkly, and the material inside does not seem to bunch up easily. (I have not washed it yet, so I can't speak to condition post-wash.) It is not as warm as real down, but, considering the difference in price, it is very close to it. The XL size of it makes it seem very luxurious, and it is also nice to use on the sofa while watching TV or reading.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is garbage. The fill comes out every time it is washed or used. I have washed it four or five times now and each time there is fluff everywhere. When it comes out of the dryer I have to spend 15 minutes with a lint brush and a pair of scissors to make it presentable.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M. Klima

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the dorm!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son to go to college and I’m so happy with this purchase. I was going to get him a down comforter and the a duvet which would have cost at least $150 but then I read the reviews on this comfortable and decided to try it. I was more than please of the quality and softness of this item. My son says it feels perfect and he can’t tell the difference from his down comforter at home!
customer_reviews.author: janineo

customer_reviews.title: Good enough!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the taupe set for my world themed dorm room. The color is true to the photo displayed. Material feels nice and the comforter itself feels like it will be warm for the winter. I haven’t washed it yet, but I did notice some stray strings that look confused. Hopefully they won’t unravel when I do wash it. Overall, you get a nice comforter set for a good price. Let’s hope it lasts four years. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Roum

customer_reviews.title: Decent, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Initially upon unpacking, the comforter begins to expand, thus releasing loose filling pieces quite a bit. There were also quite a few long, loose, threads needing removed. Some sniped off. Had a fresh off the assembly line look. Other than that. I love the feel. Lighter weight than my goose down. I bought the oversized queen. Which is about right for what I wanted. I just hope when it needs cleaned, the seems hold, and the sizing stays true. Also recommend "fluffing " each square pocket for an even look.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable, light and good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: We are from South Africa and my son started College in the USA end of August, so we had to order everything online. Not knowing which brands to buy, we had to rely on reviews and descriptions as guidelines. Here in SA we use duvets, not comforters, so this was also a new experience. The first question I asked him about all the orders was, “What does the comforter feel like”, and he loves it! He says it is nice and soft, very comfortable, AND LIGHT. When it comes to bedding we do not believe in buying the cheapest, as he is a swimmer and needs a good nights rest. Thanks for this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lize Hayman

customer_reviews.title: nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: I got the Twin XL hoping for total bed coverage on my Full mattress. Not as wide as I'd hoped. Get the Queen size for a Full. Other than that, it is light so you won't feel crushed like you would under a heavier winter bed cover, and it's soft and warm. Perfect for a New England winter night. **Update** Got the Full/Queen. Perfect on my full mattress. Doesn't sweep the floor and has enough left over to pull up under your chin on a cold night.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Colors are off and fade significantly
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because we bought black, and the color is VERY light black and faded significantly after washing. It is now a grey comforter. Thankfully, it is for my teenager and he could not care less what color it is. I would not purchase again or for my own bedroom. Otherwise, it is lightweight but warm. My son seems to like and thinks it’s comfy.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter she loves the color and how soft and comfortable it is
customer_reviews.text: This was order for my daughter she loves the color and how soft and comfortable it is. I ordered one for my son about 3 years ago and we love these comforters. I am so thrilled I can wash it in our washing machine. It is very warm as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart,
customer_reviews.text: arrived as promised, within a few weeks there was fill coming out of the comforter, in areas not near seams. tiny pinholes with fill coming out, not cool this is after maybe a few weeks of use without being machine washed, the comforter i had before this, lasted for years without issue, i wouldnt buy this one again
customer_reviews.author: John Bodkin

customer_reviews.title: The perfect comforter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the red and it’s the most beautiful red I’ve ever seen! Over the years, at night I would get too hot or too cold and it would be a constant on and off with other comforters , no matter the brand or how expensive they were was same issues....With Bare Home Comforter finally found what I’ve been looking for💃🏽💃🏽💃🏽💃🏽 no more on and off, somehow it balanced my body temperature and I stayed asleep all night. it’s light which I love and very soft on the skin. Highly recommend this comforter and the price is very reasonable, plan to get few more colors 😁
customer_reviews.author: Jill I.

customer_reviews.title: Too Hot for Summer Use in a Home with AC
customer_reviews.text: Comforter seems well made. Good color (dark grey). Weight is too heavy and temp is too hot for summer months in an air conditioned home, so not the “all season” breathable comforter as described. Would have returned but my son promptly cut off the tags before he even put it on his bed. Sigh! Should be nice and warm for the winter, however, I was wanting something for year round use. Nothing really WRONG with it; just a preference difference.
customer_reviews.author: SLP Mom

customer_reviews.title: Description/color does not match actual product: Beware high of return shipping costs!
customer_reviews.text: Received the comforters and noticed right away that the color did not match what was advertised; instead of being a black/gray it is more of a tan/gray, which next to a cool gray wall looks awful. Also, i was not impressed with the blanket quality, I expected this to be very soft, but found it to be a cheap scratchy material. The craftsmanship of this product was also sub-par, loose threads every where. To top off my frustration of having to return it, I had to pay $17.40 for shipping costs. Thanks for the kick in the teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Monique H.

customer_reviews.title: Rich color & texture-perfect dorm bedding!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! We were so pleased with the rich color & texture of this comforter & sham- the crimson red was exactly as pictured! The comforter is soft & has a rich-looking tone and texture- very good value. Excellent UW Madison dorm room bedding for my son- Badger school spirit without seeming overdone. I'll update if there are any surprises after washing.
customer_reviews.author: JulieIL

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and plush like
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews after I bought the set and started to feel uneasy. The pictures make the cover look flat and washed up so receiving the blanket in a smaller than expected package didn’t help. When I first cut the plastic the cover started to plump up. (A lil scary lol) Once all the plastic was off the comforter was fully plumped! As I opened it the pillow cases tucked in the middle felt like a fancy material. Very pleasant 🥰 This set is not photogenic but I posted a pic anyway because I’m soo in love with my new look . I slept like a princess on cloud 9. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive bed topper
customer_reviews.text: I just opened it to do this review so I have no idea about its durability or easiness to clean (I take my comforters to the dry cleaners). It appears to be very nice but I have yet to sleep under it (I will tonight). You might want me to redo this review tomorrow after I have used it. One plus is that it is wider than my previous comforter and therefore covers better.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a good comforter to use for my dorm, as I didn't want to get my bedsheets dirty. Not only is this size and thickness perfect for colder days, but its super cute and brings out all the vibrant other colors I have in my room!! Sometimes its really hard to get out of bed because of it. Worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Mora

customer_reviews.title: Stay warm
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size I purchased the biggest one because I have a cal king. I haven’t washed it yet but do far it’s holding together. Oh it keeps you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Teo m.

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Really live this blanket. I bought it for post surgery comfort next week and honestly I’m not disappointed at all. I’m unsure where the bad reviews come from as well. I ordered black and it’s true to the color. The weight is heavy BUT light weight on your body at the same time. It’s just perfect and I will be buying a diff color next month from here.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria malispina

customer_reviews.title: Its worth the amount you spend.
customer_reviews.text: Just right for the amount you spend. The comforter is surprisingly warm and cozy. No need to spend so much money on real down comforters. The shams are cheaply made but the comforter is okay. Looks great on our King size bed. I bought the red one and it really lights up the room. Its worth the money. It really is.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE MELBOURNE

customer_reviews.title: What I saw thru the wrapping was great. I know he will love it
customer_reviews.text: Grandson needed a quilt and or comforter for his dorm room. I saw this Grey set and bought it. He wanted Grey! Nothing fancy and GREY! It has not been used yet and in a trunk with other items for college. What I saw thru the wrapping was great. I know he will love it! Tank You.
customer_reviews.author: MariCarrie

customer_reviews.title: Warm Minus The Puffy Comforter Style!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this comforter! I wanted a new set for my bed and pieced together an awesome combination of things, this being my top blanket and I am obsessed. It’s not only so super soft, but it has that heaviness to it of a down comforter without being huge, puffy, and bulky. Now, it’s not actually physically heavy, but absolutely perfect in that way! And it is SO soft. I won’t have my twin bed for much longer, but once I upgrade to a queen or king I’ll be getting this blanket in those sizes for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: we have these on every bed in our house
customer_reviews.text: best value ever. comforters can be so expensive and they usually just suck. these things are soft as hell, warm as hell, and very pretty. the only concern is washing the big one, but that's because of it's size, not the material. the twin size ones get clean in the wash no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable. First thing my 2 year old grandson ran out of the kitchen with PB&J on his little hands and went straight to the new comforter. I just used a baby wipe and it all came off both comforter and baby. Great product. Bought it in the natural and another in white. The pillow cases/shams are so soft and really nice too.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalMom

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Comforter
customer_reviews.text: Love my comforter. It's full and cozy. If my bedroom is cold, I will stay warm up under this and a light sheet. It looks great on the bed too. Only "issue" which isnt really an issue is, it takes a little longer to dry. Washed it twice already and usually 30 min by itself worked on my old comforter. This one takes about 45. Still love it though.
customer_reviews.author: purplecurves

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Covers adequately, would like it more if it was longer on the sides. The color is not as depicted in the picture, it is lighter which is a disappointment because it doesn't match my sheets that are actually as dark as the picture of the comforter. Otherwise, it is light and warm. Bunches up a little when washed, but can be flattened out. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because of the color. I would recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Comes with Theo shames. It is pretty light weight and soft. Good for year around use. Out of the package it is vet wrinkled. I used a iron and lightly went over it hitting the steam button. Took about 10 minutes but almost 100% wrinkle free. For the price it is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: rory deshano

customer_reviews.title: So so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried when buying these. I saw good and bad reviews and it wasn’t too expensive. I’m glad I took a chance because it is so nice!! Perfect color and softness. Not to light but not heavy. Just the perfect blanket! I went back and ordered 2 more and I plan to order one for my bed as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Teenager approved!
customer_reviews.text: This was for my sons room to make it more “high school” cool. He really liked it. It’s not too heavy or too light. We live where weather gives us hot summers and cold winters so it’s perfect for year round. I love that it’s oversized to cover the mattress when the bed is made.
customer_reviews.author: Smoore

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It came neatly packed air sealed. The comforter is very soft! I got the red for my son's room and it is a good color red. The pillowcase was like a regular one. I thought it would be like a matching sham like type of pillowcase but I'm still happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: beautyallN1

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Just pulled the comforter out of the package, not as big as I expected and has a hole.
customer_reviews.author: MC16

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a red comforter When I washed it It shed so much,and had red dye it left stains on the inside of my dryer. I put it in the trash, not good enough for charity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable! Be VERY CAREFUL washing and drying
customer_reviews.text: This comforter soaks up a lot of water and becomes very heavy handling. Make sure you have an extra large washer and dryer with gentle cycles, it rips and opens up easily. Would still get another one for a guest bedroom, but not for my main bed where regular washing is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Color not perfect, but still totally worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this comforter set. It’s so unbelievably soft. Well vacuum sealed for shipping. Haven’t washed it yet so not sure now it’ll hold up, but I always use delicate and low tumble dry so I’m sure it’ll work fine. My only disappointment is that the black isn’t dark black. It’s more of a very very dark grey, which is only really noticeable because my sheets, furniture, rug, and tapestries are all black. If you have struggled to match shades of black with your articles of clothing then you know what I mean. Still totally worth the purchase though. No complaints from me! So cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Max M.

customer_reviews.title: I use these for insulated window coverings
customer_reviews.text: I love these to keep the house cool in summer and warm in winter. I sew little loops every 2 to 3 feet and hang from screws above the window trim. The price is great and they really work. Get a light color if you want sunlight to come in. Get a dark color to block the light.
customer_reviews.author: j.g.r.

customer_reviews.title: ehhh
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, although it is much lighter than the grey pictured. My problem is, it is very poor quality. After one wash, it came out with a stain. I have tried removing it but it just makes it worse. Each time I was it, another stain appears! There are two rips in the comforter as well. It is also very short, if you do not have a bedskirt, size up! On a positive note, it is soft and fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a boy’s room
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a solid comforter for my son’s bed so we don’t have to change it every time we change up the decor in his room. This comforter is very soft and comfortable to snuggle up in. I looked around at a few places and was very happy I found this on Amazon - just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: dd

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but warm
customer_reviews.text: I assume this would be too thin, this is perfect and keeps me warm at night. nice material too.
customer_reviews.author: MiMiBee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is great and the sheets. Its not to warm or too cold. It's perfect for all weather. I wish it was prime to get it in two days that is why I did not give it 5 stars. it took a week to get here but otherwise great comforter and planning to buy another one for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: SHR

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: Day one and the threaded seems were already pulling. For the price, I didn’t expect to be over the moon, but I certainly thought it would last longer than a day. The seller also refused my return request. I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: KMonahan

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for XL twin beds. These are wonderful, so soft. Fit is perfect for our new Tempru pedic bed. Might want to buy more colors. Bare home products are a fav of ours now. Also, bought sheets.
customer_reviews.author: wright laura

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, washes nicely, color was spot on to the photos.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this comforter. The only reason I gave it a 4 in comfort is that I wish they offered it in stone washed to soften the fabric even more. I have washed 3 times in hot water hoping I could get it to more of a stone washed look and feel but it still looks and feels like new! Oh well guess I'll have to keep washing or get out my old wash board :) Rit used to have a stone wash powder...maybe I'll look for that.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Vallee

customer_reviews.title: This is a good comforter, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, but definitely not the lightest. It doesn't feel like a cheap light-weight comforter. It has some weight to it and seems warmer than many thin comforters I've used before (compare product weights before you buy). It's well stuffed/quilted with the microfiber filling, but it seems like some of the fibers either pull through (or they're just clinging on) to the outside. These lighter colored microfibers show up more easily on the the dark navy color (they might be less visible in the lighter colors). But, overall it's a good comforter, especially for the price! Very satisfied after a couple weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I love it- this is true to color, great quality, light but warm at the same time and although I have not washed it yet am sure it will be fine. Slept amazing last night and I would order it again. It is easy to put together as the inside of the duvet cover has ties to keep the quilt in place and I LOVE THAT. I never buy duvets because the inside never stays put so this was a nice touch! Thank you so very much!
customer_reviews.author: Jpaup

customer_reviews.title: Much better than that overpriced cheap campus bed in bag! This is the one for the dorm.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my last kid I’m sending off to University and my only regret is I didn’t find this for my three older kids! I washed it and the color held up, it’s ultra soft and the baby boy loves it. The bed in a bag places the campuses offer have cheap comforters and horrible me sheets that get tons of pilling. This one washes well and was a great value. I’m ordering different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Flyy Elder

customer_reviews.title: love this  comforter
customer_reviews.text: This is the second comforter I've bought from Bare Home. We love them! The quality is excellent, they're very soft, and keep me so warm at night. I will definitely buy from Bare Home again!
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Noll

customer_reviews.title: Good quality comforter.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, nice feel, and very warm. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because the pillow shams are just pillow cases, very thin and plain, too - not what I'd expect, and not on the same level as the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy B

customer_reviews.title: Best comforter I’ve ever bought!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter! It was larger then I thought, and way softer then I thought. I was a little worried when it came because the bag it came in was very compact but let me assure you that once it was opened it fluffed right up and was so soft, and way bigger then I thought. We ordered the oversized Queen and it was great! I would 100% recommend this comforter and would definitely buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kratz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the set, I ran it through the wash to be safe. My only complaint is some of the stuffing inside started to come out through the fabric, but I just brushed it off and fluffed it out, after it went through the dryer I couldn't notice any difference. The comforter is very warm and the fabric is very soft along with the pillow cases. I was actually surprised, compared to some more expensive pillowcases i've bought, I actually preferred these ones. Color is great. I am pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Mavloc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Comforter!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my sons dorm room. Soft. Great fabric that doesn't pile, wrinkle or fade. Washes great... looks even better after washing. Perfect weight. Would recommend this comforter without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: doodlemom

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to Sleepyville
customer_reviews.text: I‘ve bought this product in different colors because it’s simply perfect. Soft, but not so light that it doesn’t weigh you down for a good sleep. Washes and dries extraordinarily well. I’d LOVE a larger range of colors but I currently have the red and the grey - if there was a better green I’d be on it. BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: JessieEK

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: I really hate writing poor reviews, but I have been sleeping with this comforter for under a month now and it has already ripped. It is still comfy, but very poor and non durable product quality. I hope the company considers the other less than ideal reviews they have received recently and can come up with a solution!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Magnuson

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my nephew and each was used by him and my husband. One of them had fluff coming out on one side. I called customer service, took a pic, sent it to them and a new one was on the way! They were so friendly and apologetic. My husband and nephew say the comforters are GREAT and very warm. Can't wait to see for myself but according to them, great comforter for a good price and superb customer service! Will definitely look to Bare Home for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: ANNE HEALY

customer_reviews.title: For people who like to sleep warm
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter. Washed it and it came out fine and it is so good temperature wise at nice and is so fluffy and cuddly. If you like to be colder when you sleep this isn’t the comforter for you but if you like keeping your body heat this is a great price and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Off to an itchy start
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, lightweight, but released an extra ordinary amount of fuzz. Had to wash multiple times upon arrival to clear fuzz being emitted from filling? A bit itchy at first, after a few washes, was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Seabreezes71

customer_reviews.title: The Best Comforter I Have Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: SINCERELY-- this comforter is the best comforter I have ever owned! I knew I wanted a black comforter, but a comforter that was BREATHABLE, COMFORTABLE, & EASY TO CLEAN. This comforter has been all of these things!! (I bought the size: Full; in the color: black) I love the company too-- they reached out personally to check in on how I loved their product. & I am not one to leave reviews, but I wanted to personally leave one for this product-- it was well worth the money. I rest easy every night! & I love how the look created a new vibe for my room! If you're looking to buy-- BUY ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylan Renea

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING !
customer_reviews.text: I have buy my sheets from here always because they are soo soft and actually deep pocketed! I am now going to forever buy my comforter sets from here because wow it is amazing ! Soft, warm, lightweight ! Just perfect ! The color is great ! Update: Bought a white set as well and yup still awesome !!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It has great coverage, I love the color. It is not lightweight nor heavy. It is somewhere in between. It is all polyester. I washed it in cold water and tumble dried low and had no problems..
customer_reviews.author: Jill edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the value. It washed and dried nicely, it is warm with making me sweat, soft, and fluffy. I would definitely buy this product again. The dog loves making a snuggle nest with this comforter too.
customer_reviews.author: dd225

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my little one and he says it's just like mommy's. Unfortunately it is, and only unfortunately because I spent 6x the price on mine and I like this one better! Super soft and comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: SnowRose

customer_reviews.title: Dog friendly 😎
customer_reviews.text: Great comforter for the money, not to heavy yet still very warm. It has held up well to my golden retriever who tries to dig a bed on the bed several times a day. Washes and dries well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality comforter for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this comforter! Navy blue is a beautiful rich color and the fabric is very soft. No off gassing smell when I opened the package which was nice also. This was a perfect choice for my toddlers new twin bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cozy soft & light
customer_reviews.text: Cozy. I couldn’t find a single thing wrong with this blanket. I also didn’t go looking for something to complain about. Its warm. It’s light. What I have noticed is that if you spill anything Or use oily products (like lotion or oils) on your skin it will soak up easily. I have newborn and her Bottle fell over for just a second now I have a stain but I’m sure that’ll come out in the wash. Let’s see if the coziness holds up after the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: Trenae McNair

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and softness/look!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a bargain for the price. It is true red and it washes very well. Soft. I live in Houston Texas and it is great for winters with a light blanket I bought from West Elm. In the summer, this is all you need. Very happy and full/queen fits my full size adjustable bed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Fritsch

customer_reviews.title: Really Hot Under There
customer_reviews.text: I'll still give it a 4 even though its not really breathable. It keeps your body heat in and feels like you are in a sauna. Had to get out from underneith it almost every night so far since i got it. Other than that quality and softness is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Andrew stuck

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was 4 inches longer.
customer_reviews.text: Taking one star off because Of the size. It sucks when it says king/ Cal king the measurements on both are absolutely different. I have king cover and again it’s a little too big. By about 4 inches. But the quality is absolutely amazing. Can definitely compare it to a $180 comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey and Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's good. Comfy, soft. The comforter is a nicer quality than the shams in my opinion. The stitching was a bit off on the shams but since I got the black one it wasn't very noticable. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: The comforter does what it is supposed to. It will keep you warm and looks nice on the bed. The only thing I don’t like about it is after each wash, I have to spread it across the bed and use tape to get all of the fuzzies off of it. It looks like whatever fill is used in it is actually coming through the outer material.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi S.

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T LAST A MONTH
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing and beautiful, until the stuffing from the inside was coming out and getting everywhere. It didn't even make it to a second wash. It was trash. A big waste of money! I bought another comforter from Walmart and it's been lasting me for more than 6 months and there has been 0 issues. Do better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and lightweight comforter
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is literally the best comforter. It's lightweight, super soft and scrumptious. I prefer to lay on it than under it because it compliments my mattress so well (my mattress is not as comfy as this comforter). Anyways, I got the black, and it's beautiful. I plan to purchase in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Loveled21

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with a sham pillow, only the case
customer_reviews.text: Soft definitely. No pillow came in mine, only the pillowcase. I couldn’t tell from the details or reviews if a pillow was supposed to come or not. Fits my twin bed nicely but now I have an extra sham pillowcase with no pillow in it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like decent quality and should be good for my sons dorm room. Haven’t washed it yet so we will see how it holds up. The navy blue is a deep rich blue color. He’s happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have washed this twice no in the industrial washing machines at the laundromat without it falling apart. I have had success with this blanket thus far. It is light weight enough for summer usage.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Doran

customer_reviews.title: Not Warm or Soft.
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set is decent, although not quite as warm or soft as I'd hoped. It's fairly lightweight and is an average product. Down comforters are much nicer than this one. But for the price it's not bad. It can be used year-round, through cold and warm weather.
customer_reviews.author: P@¡n ₩@rr¡0rTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fabric
customer_reviews.text: It came on time, and I love it! It is comfortable, beautiful, and soft. HOWEVER, when I washed it was DESTROYED in the washing machine. It’s ruined and I can’t even use it anymore. The fabric is so cheap, and in highly disappointed. Great comforter, but you’ll never be able to wash it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: So soft and great quality! It also is a great value for the price! It comes with a sham that we did not use at this time! I love the gray, it was exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Melody Newton

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. We have a thing for soft blankets in my house and I was surprised with how soft this one is. Thought about taking it form my son, lol. I will be buying another for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, and soft
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price for this lightweight comforter. I got the light gray, and already have the black. It is very soft and comfortable. I use as a spread and a blanket in Florida. Super nice.
customer_reviews.author: CindyB

product_meta.title: Bare Home Kids Comforter Set - Twin/Twin Extra Long - Goose Down Alternative - Ultra-Soft - Premium 1800 Series - Hypoallergenic - All Season Breathable Warmth (Twin/Twin XL, Sand)
feature_bullets: Luxurious 1800 Ultra Soft Double Brushed 100% Microfiber

EXTREMELY SOFT AND COZY: Our fluffy, ultra-soft down alternative comforter is everything you need for a dreamy night’s sleep. With a luxurious breathable siliconized fiber filling, it is truly all season. Enjoy feeling warm and snug on a chilly evening while still feeling just right the rest of the year.

MASTERFUL CONSTRUCTION: Crafted with care, these comforters are fade resistant, wrinkle resistant and durable. Our comforters feature a solid box stitch to contain the fill and prevent shifting or bunching. Piped edges provide a clean and elegant look. The double brushed surface is delightful against bare skin. The easy-care microfiber is machine washable. Just pop it in on gentle cycle with cold water and air dry or tumble dry on low. This comforter is meant to last!

GOOD FOR YOU & HYPOALLERGENIC: Made from 100% hypoallergenic microfiber. Microfiber material creates a barrier and protects against common allergens. Sleep tight knowing that your bedding guards against dust mites, mold and mildew.
WHAT IS INSIDE: This comforter set includes one twin/twin XL Ultra-Soft Down Alternative Comforter (66” by 92”) and one matching pillow sham (20” by 30”).

30 DAY RISK FREE 100% GUARANTEE: We believe in our products so much we guarantee that you will love them! If you are not satisfied, simply contact us to return the item for a refund. Please see our return policy for details.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,679 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Fabric Type: Luxurious 1800 Ultra Soft Double Brushed 100% Microfiber
